data.text: @KitraMcguffey "To request face mask exemptions, please email our Disabilities Team at ACAA@allegiantair.com at least 10 days prior to the departure of the first flight on your itinerary. If your exemption is approved, a negative COVID test will be required within 3 days of each flight."

@HJSrn Hi Heather! We are very sorry to hear about this. Fortunately, we do have a process in place for these situations. If you think you may have left an item behind on the plane or in the terminal, please complete this Lost and Found request form: https://t.co/MdCDdAtdUt - C

urls.title: Lost and Found
urls.description: Please note that NYC Transit now offers shipping of recovered lost items. When the item is found, having your item(s) shipped saves you a trip to the Lost and Found Office, at the 34th Street-Penn Station lower mezzanine of the A, C and E subway train lines. We encourage you to take advantage of this shipping convenience. It’s fast, easy, and safe. Please, always wait for an email and/or text message from us if you want to pick up a found item before dropping
